alert.note: Alert for Butler; Lancaster; Saunders; Seward (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 18 at 11:18PM CDT until April 18 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LANCASTER...NORTHEASTERN SEWARD...SOUTHEASTERN BUTLER AND SOUTHWESTERN SAUNDERS COUNTIES... At 1117 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bee, or 8 miles north of Seward, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. Half dollar sized hail was reported in Utica at 10:50pm. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Dwight around 1125 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Brainard and Valparaiso. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
